summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing leisure activities on the island of Bequia. Epstein mentions the availability of ATVs and jet skis, and Staley expresses gratitude for their friendship while wishing safe travels to Paris.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing leisure activities on his island.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, expressing gratitude for friendship and discussing travel plans.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley share a friendly relationship, as indicated by their correspondence.

keyFacts: Epstein discusses the availability of ATVs and jet skis on his island.
Staley mentions being anchored in Christmas Cove and enjoying Bequia.
Staley wishes Epstein safe travels to Paris.
The email is marked as confidential and includes disclaimers regarding securities and legal matters.
